name: The Flower (Ibrahim Oezhan)
description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY FABIAN A game for my friend Fabian who has birthday at the day this game released. He is a gardener so i thought i would make a game about a flower.

You got a flower seed from some weird guy in your school. He said that this Flower only needs to be watered  once a year but if you give it to much or not enough water it dies instantly. DONT LET IT DIE. The game has a really deep meaning behind it. Let me know if you figured it out :)

Controlls:

MouseLeft , Enter or Space to stop the moving arrow

Credits:

Game: Ibrahim Oezhan
